snippet.title: We Who Are About To Die | Launch Trailer (Release Date Reveal) | Gladiator Strategy Roguelite
snippet.description:
NOTE: Release date has moved up 1 day, November 14th!!

The ultimate gladiator sim, releasing in Early Access November 14 2022.
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/973230/We_Who_Are_About_To_Die/?utm_campaign=trailer

Fight & strategize your way through spectacles and arenas from lowly slave to Grand Champion. Or... die trying. In this RPG Roguelite you will manage your career and face your enemies in gladiatorial combat, using a unique physics based combat system. 

Those who are about to die, I SALUTE YOU!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/JordyLakiere
Web: https://jordylakiere.net/WeWhoAreAboutToDie-Game


Free stock footage provided by Videezy.com
